item.description:
Meeting begins at 6:00 PM. Feel welcome to bring your dinner..

Film screening starts at 7:00 PM

From JFK II - The Bush Connection - has been re-issued as

Dark Legacy:

George Bush and the Assassination of JFK.

Film running time about 1 hour and 40 minutes


Longer, better organized, and MUCH better looking than JFK II, Dark Legacy is still a thorough, documented, criminal indictment of George Herbert Walker Bush, establishing beyond a reasonable doubt as a supervisor in the conspiracy to assassinate John F. Kennedy. We are raising money to pay for a theatrical distribution. Please tell your friends. All copies: $20.00 JFK II

This may be one of the most relevant films today that shows how WWII had not ended..
and one can see how the the coup d'etat of JFK's assassination and the events of September 11, 2001 are related..

Very important film! The key link.. George Bush Sr. and the NAZI connection..
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Frances Crowe community room in the back of the Woodstar Cafe
item.name: Dark Legacy - George Bush and the Assassination of JFK
